name: PaladinAura 5E
description:
A Roll20 API that auto-applies Paladin Auras and shows which characters are affected by the aura through the use of token-markers.
Depreciated version: https://github.com/LaytonGB/PaladinAura
authors: Layton Burchell. Special thanks to: Gustav Merelius.

useroptions.name: DiagonalMeasurementMethod
useroptions.description: Changes how distances are calculated between tokens. "auto" will match the settings of the page.
